divs: sighting detailsi was driving north down a road that had multiple stoplights. when i was stopped i saw what appeared to be a bright white twinkling star. i continued to watch it because it appeared much brighter and lower than a typical star. i rubbed my eyes to make sure i was seeing clearly.the object twinkled. i watched it for over five minutes to see if it moved. at least 5 minutes passed and it remained stationary. then it began to move south slowly and silently. was it was overhead i saw it was shaped like a boomerang\stealth with a blue light on the tip of one wing and a red light on the tip of another. once it began to move i was surprised since i had watched it for over 5 minutes and it hadn't moved. i thought it was the stealth but someone told me the stealth can't hover. i lost sight of the object as it was moving south and i began to drive east.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Roseville
There were no other sightings in Roseville on or around January 22nd 2008
Summary: object that looked like bright star was stationary for over 5 minutes than began to move
